test.name: Does the TA's metadata policy for an RP contain a correct client_id parameter value
test.description: In order to check the compliance of a metadata policy issued by the TA, an entity statement for an RP must be fetched in the entity's fetch endpoint. Once obtained the entity statement, the metadata_policy parameter is taken and the presence of the client_id parameter inside the openid_relying_party type is checked. It must contain {"essential":true}
